content: CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Nov 2018What are the conditions to take note for not getting tax relief after topping up cpf for self or family member?The maximum CPF Cash Top-up Relief per Year of Assessment (YA) is $14,000 (maximum $7,000 for self, and maximum $7,000 for family members). And it will assist in tax relief. But what others conditions that will contribute you not to get the tax relief?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 29 Nov 2018The total income of the family member u topped up cannot exceed $4,000 in the preceding year. Personal tax relief is capped at $80k. But for normal folks we will not reach it. =D0 comments0
